full_sentence: I support holding politicians accountable. My hope for 2024 is that instead of falling for these ploys, voters in the United States will turn out in record numbers for a candidate who makes Trump sound like a limp-wristed schmuck. A candidate who demands the expropriation of the Sacklers and the execution of their corporate executives for their role in the opioid crisis
